Quarto Background Color Boxes

Source: vignettes/colorbox.qmd

Named colors

Idea: Named colors can just be included via colorbox() with their name, e.g., colorbox("red") for red.

Examples: black, gray, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, cyan, magenta, pink, darkgreen, purple.

Hex colors

Idea: Hex colors can be included via colorbox() using two arguments, their verbal description and the precise hex color code, e.g., colorbox("bluishgreen", "#009E73") for bluishgreen.

Examples: The Okabe-Ito palette as provided by palette.colors(names = TRUE) has following elements, black, orange, skyblue, bluishgreen, yellow, blue, vermillion, reddishpurple, gray.

On this page
